tool.name: trimAl: a tool for automated alignment trimming

param.name: input1
param.label: Alignment file (clustal, fasta, NBRF/PIR, nexus, phylip3.2, phylip)

param.name: mode_selector
param.label: Select trimming mode from the list
param.option: nogaps. Remove all positions with gaps in the alignment.
noallgaps. Remove columns composed only by gaps.
gappyout. Only uses information based on gaps' distribution. (see User Guide)

param.label: gap threshold
param.help: 1 - (fraction of sequences with a gap allowed). Range: [0 - 1]

param.label: min conservance percentage
param.help: Minimum percentage of the positions in the original alignment to conserve.

param.name: out_format_selector
param.label: Select trimmed alignment output format from the list
param.option: FASTA format. Sequences name length up to 10 characters.
PHYLIP/PHYLIP4 format. Sequences name length up to 10 characters
PHYLIP format compatible with PAML. Sequences name length up to 10 characters.
PHYLIP3.2 format. Sequences name length up to 10 characters.

tool.help:
Modes -nogaps Remove all positions with gaps in the alignment. -noallgaps Remove columns composed only by gaps. -gappyout Use automatic selection on "gappyout" mode. This method only uses information based on gaps' distribution. (see User Guide). -strict Use automatic selection on "strict" mode. (see User Guide). -strictplus Use automatic selection on "strictplus" mode. (see User Guide). -automated1 Use an heuristic method to decide which is the best automated method for a given MSA. trimAl v1.4.rev15 build[2013-12-17]. 2009-2013. Salvador Capella-Gutierrez and Toni GabaldÃ³n.
Custom mode parameters -gt -gapthreshold <n> 1 - (fraction of sequences with a gap allowed). -st -simthreshold <n> Minimum average similarity allowed. -cons <n> Minimum percentage of the positions in the original alignment to conserve.
Output formats -nbrf Output file in NBRF/PIR format -mega Output file in MEGA format -nexus Output file in NEXUS format -clustal Output file in CLUSTAL format -fasta Output file in FASTA format -fasta_m10 Output file in FASTA format. Sequences name length up to 10 characters. -phylip Output file in PHYLIP/PHYLIP4 format -phylip_m10 Output file in PHYLIP/PHYLIP4 format. Sequences name length up to 10 characters. -phylip_paml Output file in PHYLIP format compatible with PAML -phylip_paml_m10 Output file in PHYLIP format compatible with PAML. Sequences name length up to 10 characters. -phylip3.2 Output file in PHYLIP3.2 format -phylip3.2_m10 Output file in PHYLIP3.2 format. Sequences name length up to 10 characters.
trimAl webpage: http://trimal.cgenomics.org
